/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a bridge, providing a panoramic view of the city's daily life. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and taxis navigating their way through the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with billboards and advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the cityscape. The predominant colors in the image are shades of gray and green, reflecting the blend of urban development and natural elements in Beijing.
